database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Mining the Human Urine Proteome for Monitoring Renal Transplant Injury
entry.description: a) 8-plex iTRAQ-based quantitative proteomics analysis of the urine proteome comparing 4 different clinical conditions; b) Label-free LC-MS analyses of individual urine samples from different clinical conditions

additional_fields.field: Representative mass and accurate mass for 113, 114, 116 & 117.
